alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 12:50PM CDT until May 11 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 1249 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Galion to near Sondheimer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Providence, Oak Grove, Mayersville, Epps, Kilbourne, Forest, Cary, Bonita, Pioneer, Valley Park, Sondheimer, Goodwill, Galion, Shelburn, Monticello, Darnell, Gassoway, Transylvania, Onward and Jones. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and northwestern and west central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
